name: Sarbina aka my Pinguin🐧
greetingText: -`♡´- I made this special website for you -`♡´-
wishText: Happy Valentine's Day Sayangg 🌹 On this day of love, Thank you for being my partner in this incredible journey. Here's to creating more beautiful memories together. 💖 just a friendly reminder about our dinner tonight at 20:00. Can't wait to share a special Valentine's Day with you. See you soon! 💖
